channel.title: Tristan Maindron - Symfony Certified Expert Developper - Web Log
channel.description: Ceci est un exemple de flux rss 2.0

item.title: Ludum Dare 43: Post mortem of Panquetzalt
item.description: A bit late as usual, here is what I learned, what worked and what didn't while attempting for the first time the Ludum Dare. As it was my first LD, my only goal was to submit something completed, even a very bad game.

item.title: Procjam 2018: Post mortem of Causality
item.description: Better later than never, here is a feedback on my attempt at the the ProcJam 2018. The goal was to create something that generates things. So I made a procedurally generated timeline that tells the story of a fictional planet.

item.title: Twigcs, it's the missing Phpcs for Twig!
item.description: Lately I've been working a lot on Twigcs, an open source project I initiated while working at Allocin√© and kept working on ever after. So I felt like it's time to speak about it here.
